scripts.gen: npm run build && node dist/index.js gen --papers_dir ~/Dropbox/papers/books --output db.json
scripts.gen_arXiv: npm run build && node dist/index.js gen --papers_dir arXivPDFs --output db_arXiv.json
scripts.gen_all: npm run build && node dist/index.js gen --papers_dir ~/Dropbox/papers/ --output db_all.json
scripts.server: npm run build && node dist/index.js server --db db.json
scripts.server_all: npm run build && node dist/index.js server --db db_all.json
